page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: There is a great mixture of housing in the village all of it either{detached or{semi-detached.}There are{cottages dating back to Elizabethan times, {council houses}dating back to the 1930's which are mostly {semi-detached,}houses owned by the Water Board and rented out, and expensive executive type{detached houses.The{black and white}houses in Church Lane used to have{thatched roofs in the 1930's. There have been three{vicarages}in the village all within a stones throw of each other and all now occupied.{Sheriffhales {Manor}is a glorious spectacle of architecture of yesteryear.
